sentences.sentence: Tom Sawyer said I was a numskull.
sentences.translation: 汤姆·索亚说我简直是个笨蛋。

sentences.sentence: Every one knows you are a numskull.
sentences.translation: 所有人都知道你有个笨脑瓜！

sentences.sentence: Well, am I wrong? Every one knows you are a numskull.
sentences.translation: 哼，难道我（说）错了吗？所有人都知道你有个笨脑瓜！
